author: HoodedOne
title: Great set for a special event.
review:
Black Friday 2019, Amsterdam

This set was a 'gift with purchase' when you bought for €75, during the grand opening event of the LEGO flagship store Amsterdam. 
It's a typical 15-20 euro set (127 pieces), without any exclusive parts. 
The build is nice, but nothing special. If you want to build it, the instructions can probably be found online (or ask :) )

I see this set for crazy prices online (€75 and up), and unless you are a die hard LEGO collector with enough money to spend. This set is not worth that kind of money.
